title: Are purchases from Oakley Vault the same quality as the regular selection? - Quora

response.answer_text: Just to update a previous incorrect answer — the eyewear available at Oakley Vaults is not exclusively ‘old eyewear’. Discontinued Eyewear (DE) is available only at Oakley Vaults and at a greatly reduced price. DE items are unsold retail items that have been returned to factory for QC and redistributed to Vaults. Though Oakley Vaults sell DE items, they are also equipped with most of the latest and greatest you'd expect to find at a retail location. From the newest Elmonts to the oldest Hijinx — snowboard/motocross goggles, football and hockey visors galore. All of those from factory, and nowhere else unless specifically a DE item. Note, you won't find a Vault store that is outfitted with a Rx (prescription) frame selection — Opticians only work in retail locations.
